scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others "cd api && yarn dev" "cd app && yarn dev"
scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others "cd api && yarn start" "cd app && yarn start"
scripts.gen: yarn run apollo codegen:generate --target typescript --outputFlat app/types
scripts.build: yarn gen && cd app && yarn build
scripts.deploy: concurrently --kill-others "cd api && yarn deploy" "cd app && yarn deploy"
